        Remove the array variable index, if present, from the supplied variable name
        Parameters:
        variableName - variable name
        Returns:
        The variable name, with the array index removed

      • removeStringSize

        Remove the string size array variable index, if present, from the supplied variable name
        Parameters:
        variableName - variable name
        Returns:
        The variable name, with the string size array index removed

      • getVariableArrayIndex

        Get the array variable index, if present, from the supplied variable name
        Parameters:
        variableName - variable name
        Returns:
        The array index, with the variable name removed

        Check if a variable name represents an array member
        Parameters:
        variableName - variable name
        Returns:
        true if the variable is an array member

      • formatArrayIndex

        protected static java.lang.String formatArrayIndex(int[] arrayIndex)
        Add brackets to encompass a variable array index value(s)
        Parameters:
        arrayIndex - array of array variable index value(s)
        Returns:
        Array index value(s), surrounded by brackets

      • getArrayIndexFromSize

        protected static int[] getArrayIndexFromSize(java.lang.String arrayString)
        Parse an array size into an array of integers representing each array index
        Parameters:
        arrayString - array size value in the format [#]<[#]<...>> or #<,#<,...>>
        Returns:
        Array of integers representing each array index. An empty array is returned if the array size cell is blank

      • getNumMembersFromArraySize

        protected static int getNumMembersFromArraySize(java.lang.String arraySizeS)
        Get the total number of array members using the data tables array size cell text
        Parameters:
        arraySizeS - string representing the array variable dimension sizes
        Returns:
        Total number of members in the array; 0 if not an array variable

      • getNumMembersFromArrayDimension

        protected static int getNumMembersFromArrayDimension(int[] arraySize)
        Get the total number of array members using the array dimension values
        Parameters:
        arraySize - array of the array variable dimension sizes
        Returns:
        Total number of members in the array; 0 if not an array variable

      • compareTo

        protected static int compareTo(java.lang.String arrayVariable1,
                               java.lang.String arrayVariable2)
        Compare two array variable members by array dimension value(s)
        Parameters:
        arrayVariable1 - first array variable member to compare
        arrayVariable2 - second array variable member to compare
        Returns:
        0 if the array members are the same, -1 if the first array member occurs prior to the second array member (based the their array dimension value(s), and 1 if the first array member occurs after the second array member
